description: Remove a secondary cluster from the Global datastore using the Global datastore name. The secondary cluster will no longer receive updates from the primary cluster, but will remain as a standalone cluster in that Amazon region.

parameters.name: GlobalReplicationGroupId
parameters.description: The name of the Global datastore.

parameters.name: ReplicationGroupId
parameters.description: The name of the secondary cluster you wish to remove from the Global datastore.

parameters.name: ReplicationGroupRegion
parameters.description: The Amazon region of secondary cluster you wish to remove from the Global datastore.

nested_items.name: GlobalReplicationGroup
nested_items.description: Consists of a primary cluster that accepts writes and an associated secondary cluster that resides in a different Amazon region. The secondary cluster accepts only reads. The primary cluster automatically replicates updates to the secondary cluster.
